Html:
I am curious about the future of Prism.  Is there a product development road map?  etc?

Any information you can share would appreciated.  Working on some projects that need the reassurance of longevity and support.

Thanks,

ACanadian

Hi ACanadian,

You might find the following blog post useful, which contains the roadmap for Prism, along with other p&p assets:

  • Upcoming Release Roadmap

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
Thanks for sharing this with us, Guido.
